ygData.subject: Re: ALL spells currently in game....
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I got the idea for this program from the EQ Spell Sniffer by Wizkid.  However, it was incomplete, and didn t do everything I wanted it to do.  So I
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I got the idea for this program from the EQ Spell Sniffer by
Wizkid. However, it was incomplete, and didn't do everything I wanted it
to do. So I decided to write my own. I didn't even look at his source
code, I couldn't figure out what language it's in. I wrote the whole thing
from scratch. And you're right...it IS real simple for anyone who knows
programming.

BTW, I have added an alphabetical sort to the program, and when I get the
sort by class/level implemented I will post the new one. Most people I
have talked to have said they like the program, so I will continue to work
on it.

chpicker
Minister of Commerce, OCD
Wizard of Veeshan
